name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularStandardBodyView
desc: A template for displaying a SwiftUI label and up to three rows of text.

items.name: init(headerLabel: Label, headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, body2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider?)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a header row with a SwiftUI view and text, and two rows of body text.

items.name: var headerLabel: Label
items.desc: The SwiftUI view displayed by the template.

items.name: var headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text provider for the header text.

items.name: var body1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text provider for the first row of body text.

items.name: var body2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider?
items.desc: The text provider for the second row of body text.

declaration: final class CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularStandardBodyView<Label> : CLKComplicationTemplate where Label : View
